name: Learnvivor
description: We made this game for "Babylon Jam!" in 36 hours.  Theme was "you talking to me?". Our main goal is to teach another language for example english. Our target is A1 level users. We planned that this project will be able in mobile platforms. There is a background story about a girl who lives in London.  We're helping her to do her daily routine. When we complete the actions, game will examine you about what you learn.
